aboutText: This tool is designed to provide you with random lottery number combinations for various games. Our goal is to offer a simple, fast, and user-friendly experience. We are constantly working to improve our generator and add new features. Thank you for using our service!
howToUseText: Using the generator is easy. Just click the 'Generate' button to get a new set of lottery numbers. You can also choose to include a bonus number by checking the 'Include Bonus Number' checkbox. To copy the numbers, click the 'Copy' button next to each set.
strategySubheading: Choose a strategy to get your personalized lotto numbers.
strategy1Desc: Based on numbers that have appeared most frequently over time.
strategy2Desc: Focuses on 'hot' numbers from the most recent draws.
strategy3Desc: Picks 'cold' numbers that haven't appeared in a long while.
strategy4Desc: Enter your lucky number (1-45) for a custom combination.
strategy1Explanation: These numbers are based on a simulation of the most frequently drawn numbers throughout history.
strategy2Explanation: This combination focuses on numbers that have been simulated as 'hot' in recent draws.
strategy3Explanation: We've chosen numbers that are simulated as 'cold,' meaning they haven't appeared in a long time.
strategy4Explanation: Including your lucky number(s) {numbers}, we've crafted a combination with numbers that have good simulated synergy.
personalNumberInvalid: Please enter 1 to 6 unique numbers, each between 1 and 45. Use commas to separate numbers (e.g., 8, 15, 23).
personalNumberNoInput: Please enter your lucky number(s) for the Personalized Combo.
metaDescription: Generate intelligent lottery numbers based on statistical analysis, recent trends, long shots, or your personalized lucky numbers. Get AI-powered lotto recommendations for ultimate fun.
metaKeywords: lotto generator, lottery numbers, AI lottery, lucky numbers, lotto predictions, statistical lottery, trend analysis, personalized lotto, 로또 번호 생성기, 로또번호생성기, 로또번호 예측, 동행복권, 로또생성, ai 로또
strategy1Detail: This strategy recommends lottery numbers that have appeared most frequently throughout history. It operates on the theory that numbers with a high frequency of past draws have a greater probability of appearing again.
strategy2Detail: This approach focuses on identifying 'hot' numbers—those that have been drawn frequently in the most recent lottery results. It's a strategy that bets on the continuation of a current, short-term trend.
strategy3Detail: The 'Long Shot' strategy selects 'cold' numbers, which are those that have not been drawn for a significant period. The underlying belief is that these numbers are statistically 'due' for an appearance soon.
strategy4Detail: You provide a personal lucky number, and our generator creates a custom combination that has historically shown the best compatibility or 'chemistry' with your chosen number, based on past draw data.
shareText: I got my lucky numbers from this AI Lotto Generator! Check it out!
personalizedSubheading: Enter your name and birthdate to create your own unique lucky numbers.
personalizedNoInput: Please enter your name and birthdate.
emotionSubheading: Select the emotions you're feeling today to generate numbers that resonate with your current state of mind.
